subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Denver’s season started anew Monday night when Carmelo Anthony returned from a 15-game suspension for fighting and teamed with Allen Iverson for 51 points, 13 assists and countless highlights.
snippet: Denver’s season started anew Monday night when Carmelo Anthony returned from a 15-game suspension for fighting and teamed with Allen Iverson for 51 points, 13 assists and countless highlights.
